Today we are going to talk about the ecommerce
platform, Shopify.

6.text:
Stay tuned for the advantages and disadvantages
of this software and hopefully by the end

11.text:
of this overview you will know whether or
not Shopify is for you.

17.text:
Shopify is an ecommerce platform that allows
you to create your own online store and sell

22.text: to customers all over the world.

24.text:
The site was created in 2006, when the owners
couldn't find an easy-to-use ecommerce software

30.text:
for their store, so they decided to build
their own.

34.text:
Today, tens of thousands of online stores
are powered by Shopify, including such big

40.text: names as Tesla Motors and General Electric.

45.text:
To get started, you just create your online
store -- don't worry, you don't have to be

49.text: a techie to do this! -- and upload your inventory.

52.text:
Then, you start selling to people all over
the world!

55.text:
Shopify allows you to take all major credit
cards, PayPal, money orders, and more.

61.text:
The company continues to add new payment methods
regularly.

65.text: What is so great about it?

67.text:
Number 1: You don't have to be an awesome
techie to set up shop.

71.text: The Shopify setup is really easy.

75.text:
The hardest part about this is that there
are over 100 templates to choose from!

81.text:
Basically, you just play around with the theme
settings and make any changes to the font,

88.text:
After it looks the way you want it to, launch
it!

91.text: It doesn't get much easier than that.

92.text: Number 2: You get your own guru.

95.text:
With the setup of your shop, you also receive
a guru to help you out by giving advice on

100.text:
properly setting up your shop, selling products,
etc.

105.text:
Not only that, but your guru will help you
advertise!

109.text:
All new Shopify stores can receive a $100
credit for additional advertising on Google

116.text: Adwords so you can promote your shop on Google.

119.text:
Number 3: You can sell to anyone in the world
if you choose!

123.text:
With Shopify, you aren't really limited on
languages or currencies.

127.text:
Besides the fact that you can write your shop
in any language you want, you can also collect

133.text:
Shopify supports local currencies and tax
rates, so you can live in Canada and sell

141.text:
Number 4: It's really easy to categorize your
inventory.

145.text:
Like any major online retailer, you can categorize
your inventory into "collections".

150.text:
For example, you can put a t-shirt into the
"tees and tanks" category and the "sales"

156.text:
Number 5: It's also really easy to categorize
your customer base.

160.text:
You can put your customers into groups based
on whatever factors you want -- where they

165.text: are located, how much they spend, etc.

167.text:
Not only will this give you a better idea
of who your customers are, it will also allow

171.text:
you to target certain groups for marketing
emails.

178.text: Number 1: The really good plans can get pricey.

182.text:
For example, as you move up from one plan
to the next, you get significantly more space

187.text:
and lower credit card fees, along with other
features, but you will have to pay quite a

193.text:
For companies like Tesla, this doesn't matter
much, but for shops with high inventory but

Number 2: It redirects customers from Shopify
for checkout.

204.text:
One major complaint about Shopify is that
it redirects to another site during the checkout

212.text:
This may or may not scare your customers off
from buying, but it's definitely something

217.text: to note if you are considering using Shopify.

220.text:
Overall, Shopify is very well loved among
its customers.

223.text:
Try as I might, I was hard pressed to find
complaints from Shopify's thousands of screaming

230.text:
Okay, they weren't screaming, but they were
singing its praises.

from:

238.text: The Starter Plan costs $14 a month.

240.text:
It features unlimited bandwidth, 25 products,
1 GB file storage, and 2.9% +30 cents in credit

250.text: The Basic Plan costs $29 a month.

252.text:
It features unlimited bandwidth, unlimited
products, 1 GB file storage, a discount code

258.text:

266.text:
It features unlimited bandwidth, unlimited
products, 5 GB file storage, a discount code

271.text:

278.text: The Unlimited Plan costs $179 a month.

282.text:
It features unlimited bandwidth, unlimited
products, unlimited file storage, a discount

296.text:
Now that you know what Shopify is all about,
I hope that you can decide for yourself whether

you.
